title: Logarithmic Finance (LOG) Bursts Onto The Scene As Fantom (FTM), and Terra (LUNA) Dip - Outlook India
content: Logarithmic Finance (LOG) Bursts Onto The Scene As Fantom (FTM), and Terra (LUNA) Dip  Outlook India
description: The growth of the DeFi market in 2021, a growth of 47% in the past year, has inspired projects to enter the space and enter to make a difference within the cryptocurrency industry.
